text: Cesena is a city in the region of Emilia-Romagna in Italy. It is the capital of the Province of Forlì-Cesena. About 95,000 people live in Cesena. == Main sights == Cesena's monuments include: * the Rocca Malatestiana (castle). * the Biblioteca Malatestiana, the first public library in Italy. * the Cathedral (completed in 1500). * The Pinacoteca Comunale is housed in what was once a Benedictine monastery. * The Galleria dei dipinti antichi della Cassa di Risparmio di Cesena * The Abbey of Madonna del Monte * The Masini's Fountain * The Alessandro Bonci's Theater == Economy == Cesena's industry centers on agriculture, handicrafts, and tourism. == References == == Other websites == * Cesena home page * Cesena history and info * Cesena tourism - visitcesena.com Category:Cities in Forlì-Cesena
title: Cesena
